FireTPL Syntax declaration

FireTPL syntax is easy to write, read and understand. A HTML document can become confused and unreadable. FireTPL is lesser code to write and has a clear and strong syntax.

Tags

div span "Hello World"
<div> <span>Hello World</span> </div>
<div> <span>Hello World</span> </div>

Strings

div "String"
<div> <span>Hello World</span> </div>
<div> <span>Hello World</span> </div>
